title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Movie 2: Eternal
alternative_title: Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica Movie 2: Eien no Monogatari, 劇場版 魔法少女まどか☆マギカ 永遠の物語
description: First two films are a compilation of the television series and the third film is an all-new story.Urobuchi Gen said that the third film's story coincidentally matches the lyrics to Kalafina's television ending theme song Magia if one examines them carefully.
